data.name: Shot One
data.detailed_description:
SHOOT FOR THE STARS, TAKE YOUR SHOT, SAVE THE GALAXY!

A high-octane adventure like nothing else in the universe! Shot One combines the competitiveness of a classic arcade-style sports game with the thrills and perils of a modern-day top-down adventure game! Featuring a wide roster of charming and uniquely playable characters, Shot One’s high-speed match-a-minute gameplay forces you to think fast, react on the fly, and dominate the playing field with an array of unique special moves and abilities. Building HYPE is the name of the game, whether you’re playing against your friends in multiplayer matches, putting your skills to the test in bombastic Party mode, or taking the fight across the universe in the action-packed, lore-rich story mode!


THE FATE OF THE UNIVERSE IS IN YOUR HANDS!

In the far distant future, after the rise and fall of hundreds of civilizations, the game of Shot One is the way of life across the galaxy! And on the scenic, quiet planet of Terra, two young dreamers prepare to shoot their shot and become champions across the universe! Volley - a rambunctious scavenger with powerful robotic arms, and Vlad - an electrified contender with his sights set on the championship title,

FEATURES:
-A cinematic scifi story mode spanning the galaxy
-A colorful and diverse cast of characters with unique abilities
-Single player, multiplayer and a bombastic party mode
-Unique arenas and modes to keep things fresh

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
